price: 16. Y dicen (burlándose): “¡Señor!, adelántanos nuestra parte del castigo en esta vida antes de la llegada del Día de la Rendición de Cuentas”.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
